33470.en:
A long time ago, people from the distant Gran Zedora Kingdom came across the sea and founded this town. Eh? Ethene Village? I don't know,
but I think Lyriol mentioned something like that. If you want to know more, why don't you go to her house? Lyriol's house is at the end
of the narrow street between the inn and the Depository.

33471.en:
Hmmm, Ethene Village. Lyriol who lives there once told me about a village with that name. Well, I haven't seen her recently, but I guess
she's still at home. Her father Issho is out of town, so now is the time to ask him about it!

33472.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>You want to go back to Ethene Village? Well,
I've never heard of a village by that name,
and I have no idea where it is.

33476.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Gee, gee, gee. My chronic disease has
worsened. Until now, Issho has been making
drugs for me using some kind of alchemy.

33478.en:
You seem to have a gloomy face. You must have had some sad experience. But there must be a meaning for you to have arrived in this town.
May God bless you.

33479.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>This is Nalbia. What? Where is Ethene
Village? I'm sorry, I don't know. It's the
only town on the island.

33481.en:
That anxious look on your face, that shabby appearance! You are a drifter just like me, aren't you? But don't worry. I am doing fine
even though I drifted here with only my body. So you can manage somehow, too!

33482.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Lyriol lives alone with her father, who uses
strange magic. I haven't seen her recently. I
wonder what happened to her.

33483.en:
This is a small island with no name. This town was founded by a group of immigrants from the Gran Zedora Kingdom. These days, the number of
immigrants has dwindled. Once every few years, a few drifters like you and me wash up on the beach.

33485.en: <attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ha-ha-ha. Dad, I'm sorry. Alchemy Pot for me.

33493.en:
read the letter spread out on the desk. I'm sorry Issho, I did everything I could but I couldn't find the drug you asked
for. Kafrizz Fever is an ancient disease that is said to have died out more than a hundred years ago. There are probably no drugs left.
However, I managed to find an old book that contained a recipe for the drug, which I could use to make it in your Alchemy Pot. I
sincerely hope it will cure Lyriol of her Kafrizz Fever. To my friend Issho, from the flask

33495.en:
Hmmm, Ethene Village. Lyriol, who lives there, told me about a village with that name before. I'd like to ask her about the details, but I'm
afraid that might be difficult now that her stubborn father, Issho, has come back. Issho has been in a bad mood lately. He's been very
angry and out of town, so it's hard for me to hang out with him.

33496.en:
Did you get rid of that junk in your bag? Come
on, pick up this book!

33497.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Damn, my bear's bone! Your bag is still full.
Get rid of the junk!

33498.en:
Selecting the item and using it, you can learn simple recipes, including Strong Medicine. The book disappears after you learn the recipe,
but you can check the contents in the ''Kettle Smelting Recipe Book'' in Records. It will tell you what ingredients you will need! Now, learn
the recipe and try smelting Strong Medicine in my Alchemy Pot! If you can do it, do it!

33499.en:
What is it? You mind if I have a daughter
sleeping over there?<yesno><close>

33500.en:
Looks like you've learned the recipe. Then,
get to it! Hmm? Or are you worried about the
sleeping girl over there?<yesno><break>

33502.en:
Kafrizz Fever? Oh, that's that nasty disease that swept through the country a long time ago. I read in a book that it wiped out a
town. What? Lyriol has Kafrizz Fever? How in the world did she get that disease? Is that why Issho was acting so strange? It's hard to
stay calm when your only daughter is seriously ill, isn't it?
33502.ja:

33503.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I can't believe Lyriol has Kafrizz Fever. How
on earth did she get so sick? I hope she will
be able to survive.

33504.en:
Did you empty your bag? Please! Next, I need
you to alchemize this! It's the cure for my
daughter with Kafrizz Fever!

33505.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Damn. My bag is full. We're in a time
sensitive situation! Go empty your bag right
now!

33506.en:
Kafrizz Fever is a terrible disease from a long time ago. I let Lyriol get into this mess because I let her help me gather materials.
Please! I need you to smelt the drug for me! The ingredients, Wakerobin and Buzzberries, are both easily found around here! Once you
learn the recipe, you can find the ingredients in Records' ''Kettle Smelting Recipe Book''! Please save Lyriol's life!
33506.ja:
ã€Œãƒ¡ãƒ©ã‚¾ç†±ã£ã¦ã®ã¯ã€€å¤§æ˜”ã®ã€€æã‚ã—ã„ç—…æ°—ã ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒã€€ç´ æé›†ã‚ãªã‚“ã‹æ‰‹ä¼ã‚ã›ãŸã°ã£ã‹ã‚Šã« ã€€ãƒªãƒªã‚ªãƒ«ã‚’ã€€ã“ã‚“ãªç›®ã«ã€€ã‚ã‚ã›ã¡ã¾ã£ãŸâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

33507.en:
I'm sorry for trying to test you earlier. I hated to admit it, but it seems I've lost my alchemy powers. Please! I need you to
alchemize Kafrizz Fever Medicine for me! The ingredients are Wakerobin and Buzzberries! If I use the Kafrizz Fever Medicine book from
item, I can learn the recipe for the drug! Please save Lyriol's life!

33508.en:
Thanks to you, Lyriol is back on its feet.
Please say hello to her.

33509.en:
Hmmm... You're looking for Wakerobin and Buzzberries to make Kafrizz Fever Medicine? You can find Wakerobin by looking in the
glittery area outside of town. And Buzzberries can be found by killing the Woebergine outside of town.

33510.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, good morning. Well, your name is so. Your
name is <kyodai>, right?

33511.en:
<kyodai> received the book Kafrizz Fever
Medicine!<me 60>
33511.ko:
{kyodai}|hpp(ì€,ëŠ”)
ë©”ë¼ì¡°ì—´ ì•½ ì œì¡°ì„œë¥¼ ì†ì— ë„£ì—ˆë‹¤!<me 60>

33512.en:
Ah, yes, that's right. I remember now. Lyriol mentioned that she picked up a bottle letter the other day. I think she wrote something
about Ethene Village in that letter.

33513.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The newcomers are very quick to open up to
each other. It seems that they have already
become accustomed to each other!

33514.en:
Lyriol's Kafrizz Fever is cured! Hee. I heard
it was a terrible disease, but to cure it so
easily, alchemy is amazing!

33515.en:
I heard you can use alchemy. I heard it's a special technique and only you and Issho can use it around here. Is that why people are
gathering in this town? That's quite a feat, isn't it?

33516.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Wow. You are going to stay at Issho's house?
That's nice. I'm so envious to be under the
same roof with Lyriol!
33516.ja:
ã€Œã¸ãˆï½ã€‚ã‚ã‚“ãŸã€€ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ã‚¦ã•ã‚“ã®å®¶ã§ ã€€ãŠä¸–è©±ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã‹ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã„ã„ãªã‚ã€‚ ã€€ãƒªãƒªã‚ªãƒ«ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã¨ã€€ã²ã¨ã¤å±‹æ ¹ã®ä¸‹ãªã‚“ã¦ ã€€ã¾ã£ãŸãã€€ã†ã‚‰ã‚„ã¾ã—ã„è©±ã ãœã£ï¼

33517.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Before I knew it, the number of people had
increased. This town has become a lively
place!

33518.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>There must be a reason you ended up in this
town. May God bless you.

33521.en:
Oh! You can use the same alchemy as Issho? Good! Then I can rest assured even if my chronic illness worsens. I'm so relieved, I
have more energy!

33522.en:
Hey, Issoro. We can't get anywhere if we're too busy! Why don't you take your time and explore this island first? There are seven
different colored dustpoles on this island. The seven are locked doors at the back, but you can't get in. The keys to the locks can be
made by alchemy, and I've already made some of them. First of all, take this!
33522.ja:
ã€Œãªã‚ã€€ã‚¤ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã€‚ ã€€ã‚¸ã‚¿ãƒã‚¿ã—ãŸã£ã¦å§‹ã¾ã‚‰ã­ãˆï¼ã€€ã¾ãšã¯ ã€€ã‚†ã£ãã‚Šã€€ã“ã®å³¶ã‚’ã€€å†’é™ºã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã‚‰ã©ã†ã ï¼Ÿ

ã€Œã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã‚«ã‚®ã¯ã€€ãªã‚“ã¨ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã§ä½œã‚Œã‚‹ã‚“ã ãŒ ã€€ãã®ã†ã¡ã®ã€€ã„ãã¤ã‹ã¯ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒã‚‚ã†ä½œã£ãŸã€‚ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã¾ãšã¯ã€€ã“ã„ã¤ã‚’å—ã‘å–ã‚Œï¼

33523.en:
Oh, you've finally grown up to bring back the black sealing stone from the Red Shrine! You are indeed a master alchemist! Step by step,
the Master Alchemist is approaching the Gold Shrine! My intuition tells me he's getting closer to home!
33523.ja:
ã€Œã»ãŠã‰ã€€ã¤ã„ã«ã€€èµ¤ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€é»’ã®å°çŸ³ã‚’æŒã¡ã‹ãˆã‚‹ã¾ã§ã«ã€€æˆé•·ã—ãŸã‹ï¼ ã€€ã•ã™ãŒã ãªã€€éŒ¬é‡‘åäººï¼
ã€ŒéŒ¬é‡‘åäººã¯ã€€ä¸€æ­©ä¸€æ­©ã€€é‡‘ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã«â€¦â€¦ ã€€ã„ã‚„ï¼ã€€æ•…éƒ·ã«è¿‘ã¥ã„ã¦ã‚‹ã¯ãšã ã¨ ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ã®å‹˜ãŒã€€ãã†å‘Šã’ã¦ã‚‹ãœï¼ï¼

33524.en:
We defeated the Black Shrine monster! So you finally have everything you need! The materials for the key to the Gold Shrine!
Amazing, amazing, amazing! I knew you'd do it for sure! Come on, Master Alchemist! Let me see you smelt the key to the Gold Shrine!

33525.en:
Alchemy master! If you've defeated the Black Shrine monster, you must be perfectly content with your materials! Let me smelt the key to
the Gold Shrine!

33526.en:
The key opens the door to the Blue Shrine in Sazamire Prairie. There, you can go deeper and deeper, killing monsters and collecting
materials! When you run out of materials, come back to the town and smelt. And when you run out of things to do, leave your luggage at the
depository and start looking for materials again. Repeating material gathering and alchemy like that is the proper life of an
alchemist. And when you get stronger little by little and reach the deepest part of the Blue Shrine, you must bring back a material called
the White Seal Stone! After I do that, I'll tell you more about the Gold Shrine, the most special of the Seven Houses!
33526.ja:
ã€Œãã®ã‚«ã‚®ã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã€€ã‚µã‚¶ãƒŸãƒ¬è‰åŸã«ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€é’ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®æ‰‰ãŒé–‹ãã€‚ãã“ã§ã€€é­”ç‰©ã‚’å€’ã—ãŸã‚Š ã€€ç´ æã‚’é›†ã‚ãªãŒã‚‰ã€€å¥¥ã¸å¥¥ã¸ã¨é€²ã‚“ã§ã„ã‘ï¼

ã€Œã§ã€€å°‘ã—ãšã¤å¼·ããªã£ã¦ ã€€é’ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã€€ã„ã¡ã°ã‚“å¥¥ã¾ã§ã€€ãŸã©ã‚Šç€ã‘ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ç™½ã®å°çŸ³ã£ã¦ãˆç´ æã‚’ã€€æŒã¡ã‹ãˆã‚‹ã‚“ã ï¼
ã€Œãã‚ŒãŒã§ããŸã‚‰ã€€ï¼—ã¤ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ä¸­ã§ã‚‚ ã€€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªã€€é‡‘ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ ã€€ãŠå‰ã«ã€€ãã‚ã—ãã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚„ã‚‰ã‚ï¼

33527.en:
There are seven different colored dustpoles on this island. The keys to these seven are made by alchemy, and I have already made some of
them. Using the keys I made, you can open the door to the Blue Shrine in Sazamire Prairie. There, you can go deeper and deeper, killing
monsters and collecting materials! When you run out of materials, come back to the town and smelt. When you run out of things to do,
leave your belongings at the depository and search for materials again. If you get stronger and stronger and reach the deepest
part of the Blue Shrine, you can bring back a material called the White Seal Stone! After I do that, I'll tell you more about the Gold
Shrine, the most special of the Seven Houses!
33527.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®å³¶ã«ã¯ã€€è‰²é•ã„ã®ï¼—ã¤ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ãŒã‚ã£ã¦ãªã€‚ ã€€ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã‚«ã‚®ã¯ã€€ãªã‚“ã¨ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã§ä½œã‚Œã‚‹ã‚“ã ãŒ ã€€ã„ãã¤ã‹ã¯ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒã‚‚ã†ä½œã£ãŸã€‚
ã€Œã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒã‚„ã£ãŸã‚«ã‚®ã‚’ä½¿ãˆã°ã€€ã‚µã‚¶ãƒŸãƒ¬è‰åŸã«ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€é’ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®æ‰‰ãŒé–‹ãã€‚ãã“ã§ã€€é­”ç‰©ã‚’å€’ã—ãŸã‚Š ã€€ç´ æã‚’é›†ã‚ãªãŒã‚‰ã€€å¥¥ã¸å¥¥ã¸ã¨é€²ã‚“ã§ã„ã‘ï¼

ã€Œã§ã€€å°‘ã—ãšã¤å¼·ããªã£ã¦ ã€€é’ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã€€ã„ã¡ã°ã‚“å¥¥ã¾ã§ã€€ãŸã©ã‚Šç€ã‘ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ç™½ã®å°çŸ³ã£ã¦ãˆç´ æã‚’ã€€æŒã¡ã‹ãˆã‚‹ã‚“ã ï¼
ã€Œãã‚ŒãŒã§ããŸã‚‰ã€€ï¼—ã¤ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ä¸­ã§ã‚‚ ã€€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªã€€é‡‘ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ ã€€ãŠå‰ã«ã€€ãã‚ã—ãã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚„ã‚‰ã‚ï¼

33528.en:
Issoro has returned from the Blue Shrine. It seems you have brought back the white sealed stone from the depths of the cave. Well then,
I'll tell you about the Gold Shrine, as promised. Even I have never opened that door. But my intuition tells me that there is a
great treasure hidden in that special place! And with that treasure, it might help you find your way home, don't you think? So, Isorro,
take this!
33528.ja:

33529.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Damn. My bag is full. That's no good. Go empty
your bag right now!

33530.en:
It's the recipe for the key to the fortress that I have developed over many years of research! It contains a recipe for a key that
I've yet to refine. There is no mistake in my theory. If you go around the fortress and collect the materials, you can smelt all the
keys. If I use the key to go to the Gold Shrine, I should be able to smelt the key for the Gold Shrine at the end! For now, if you
use the white sealed stone received at the Blue Shrine, you should be able to smelt the key to the White Shrine. You're not just an
issoreau anymore, you're a pre-Iccho alchemist! Come on, Itcho-mae. Try it right away!

33531.en:
This is my hunch, but I have a feeling that there is a lot of treasure in the Gold Shrine. If you go around and collect the materials,
you will eventually be able to smelt the key to the Gold Shrine. Believe it or not, it's up to you, but for now, do as I say and go for
the Gold Shrine Key! You understand? The White Shrine is located in Polnea Mountain, far to the west. There's a big monster living there,
so be prepared!

33532.en:
Oh! Looks like you defeated the monster at the White Shrine, Itcho-mae. I admire your perseverance. Ask Lyriol about the next
stronghold.

33533.en:
Speaking of which, more and more people are coming to this town. I've heard that everyone has heard of Ichiro's reputation, but if you
ask me, there's still more to come. I'm going to collect perfectly alchemy recipes so that I can handle any kind of difficult requests!

33534.en:
Hey, Itcho, did you hear about the Ash Shrine? The monster lurking in that dusty corner is the one that turned Lyriol into Kafrizz Fever!
I'd like to take him down with my own hands! But my gut tells me that's impossible! Hey, Itcho. Please! Go beat up that monster for me!

33535.en:
Hey, Itcho! I know what I'm talking about! You beat up the monster that turned Lyriol into Kafrizz Fever, didn't you? I think it's
because of that monster that I lost my power of alchemy. You defeated Lyriol and my Kataki! But after seeing your power like this, I can't
call you Itcho Mae from now on. Alright, I'll call you a master of alchemy from now on! From now on, I'll call you Alchemy Master! Come on,
Alchemy Master! Take it! It's a small token of my appreciation!

33536.en:
I made that one a long time ago. It's a key to a stronghold full of monsters, but I'm sure you'll be fine now. But please be careful.
Lyriol will be very sad if anything happens to the alchemist!
33536.ja:
ã€Œãã„ã¤ã¯ã€€æ˜”ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ãŒä½œã£ãŸã‚‚ã‚“ã ã€‚ ã€€ã¨ã‚“ã§ã‚‚ã­ãˆé­”ç‰©ãŸã¡ãŒã„ã‚‹ã€€ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã‚«ã‚®ã ãŒ ã€€ä»Šã®ã€€ãŠå‰ãªã‚‰ã€€å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ã ã‚ã†ã€‚

33537.en:
The Red Shrine is a terrible place crawling with unbelievable monsters. But without the black sealed stone, the way to the next one
will never be opened. Anyway, good luck! Alchemy master!

33538.en:
I heard you are training at Issho's house! How do I know that? Because I am the best-informed person in this town! I'm always ready to give
you the latest information. Oh, by the way, I think there's someone I need to ask a favor of. If you see me in town, please talk to me!
33538.ja:

33539.en:
Marika, the most well-informed person in town, has the latest news for you! I heard that can do alchemy! I saw some
people who might need a favor, have you talked to them yet? If they have a favor to ask, the name above their head should be purple. Look
inside the building too!
33539.ja:
ã€Œç”ºã„ã¡ã°ã‚“ã®æƒ…å ±é€šã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€€ãƒãƒªã‚«ã•ã‚“ãŒ ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã«ã€€ã¨ã£ã¦ãŠãã®æœ€æ–°æƒ…å ±ã‚’ ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚ã’ã‚‹ã‚ã­ï¼

33540.en:
There are a lot of strong-looking people here! And I was surprised that some of them came here to meet ! I didn't know you
were such a great person, even this Marika- san. It makes the name of a well-informed person weep.
33540.ja:

33541.en:
Lyriol's father, Issho, used to dream of
becoming rich by using strange tricks when he
was young.

33542.en:
This island is in the middle of the vast
ocean, so it must be very difficult to get
here. I'm amazed that people come here.

33543.en:
I look a lot like my dead mother. My father was always so uptight about her that he wouldn't even listen to me because I looked so
much like her. If you ever need a companion to fight with, you can help out a guy in town whose name above his head is purple. I'm sure
he or she would be happy to help ! It's a give and take world. Marika at the entrance of the town is the most
knowledgeable person in the town, so please ask her if you need any help.
33543.ja:
ã€Œç§ã­ã€€æ­»ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒã£ãŸã€€ãŠæ¯ã•ã‚“ã« ã€€ã‚ˆãä¼¼ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã£ã¦ã€‚

33544.en:
, there is , isn't there? This town has grown so many people, but no one knows where Ethene Village is. I wonder where
in the world Ethene Village is.

33545.en:
I see that also went to the cave connected to the Blue Shrine. You can get some rare things there, but be careful, there are
some strong monsters. Your father almost died a few times. Also, there are three dust mounds on Polnea Mountain west of Sazamire Prairie,
one white, one gray, and one black, and each of them is said to be inhabited by a terrifying monster. But if
becomes strong enough to defeat the White Shrine monster, please do me a favor.

33546.en:
That's amazing ! I can't believe they beat the White Shrine monster! Yeah. I can only hope that you can do it now! Take
this key.

33547.en:
There is a material that can be used to make the key to the Ash Shrine in the Green Shrine Cave. I was exposed to a cursed fog near the
Ash Shrine and got Kafrizz Fever. I think it must have been caused by the monster that lives in that dust.
33547.ja:
ã€Œãã®ã‚«ã‚®ã§å…¥ã‚Œã‚‹ã€€ç·‘ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®æ´ãã¤ã®å¥¥ã« ã€€ç°ã®ã»ã“ã‚‰ã®ã‚«ã‚®ã®ææ–™ã«ãªã‚‹ã€€ç´ æãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã€‚

33548.en:
There is a material that can be used to make the key to the Ash Shrine deep inside the Green Shrine Cave. I got Kafrizz Fever when I
was exposed to the cursed fog near the Ash Shrine. I think it must have been caused by the monster that lives in that dust.

I got Kafrizz Fever when I was exposed to the cursed mist by the Ash Shrine. I think it must have been caused by the monster that lives in
that shrine. So please! I want you to go defeat the monster that made me sick! I will never forgive that monster!

Thank you . You killed the monster in Ash Shrine. To tell you the truth, it was my fault that your father lost his alchemy
power. That day, when I was searching for materials in that area, a cursed mist started to wipe away from the fortress. Dad was
wrapped up in the fog to protect me. That's why the monster in the tower was not only me, but also our son and daughter, Kataki. Thank
you! I have something for you in return!

33560.en:
Holy shit! Amazing! Alchemy master! You finally defeated the monsters in the Gold Shrine and received the treasure, didn't you?
There's a legend that the one who controls all 7 of the gold temples stands at the top of the alchemists. That's what I came to this island
for. Well, that dream was dashed in the middle of my aspiration, but you made up for my disappointment! Thank you! Alchemy master!
What is it? There's no treasure, you just made it to the other side of the island? Hmm. Well, go see what's on the other side!

There's a legend that the one who controls all 7 of the gold temples stands at the top of the alchemists. That's what I came to this island
for. Well, that dream was dashed in the middle of my ambition, but you made up for my disappointment! Thank you! Alchemy master! So,
what did you do with the treasure? What? No treasure, but your hometown of Ethene Village on the other side of the island? That means
you won't have to leave town! That's the best treasure there is! Alchemist! No! I can't call you the Alchemy Master from now on after being
shown such an amazing miracle! Alright! I'll call you the Alchemy King from now on!

33562.en:
There is a legend that the one who conquers all seven of the seven towers stands at the top of the alchemists. I came to this island
aiming for that. Well, that dream was dashed in the midst of my ambition, but you have made up for my disappointment! Thank you! The King
of Alchemy! There's nothing you can't alchemize now! From now on, please use our Alchemy Pot as much as you can, and aim higher
as an alchemist!

33563.en:
What, they found Ethene Village? It was supposed to be attacked and burned, but it's still clean? That's good! Then I'm sure
's is safe too! I hope we meet again soon.

33564.en:
I was wondering why looked so unhappy, but I see. I didn't get to meet . But I'm sure that as long as
is doing well in this town, one day you will be able to meet him! I believe so!

strange story, but I don't care.

<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Well, the ritual requires this, that, and
that. Okay, we have to succeed this time! The
summoning of the Demon God!

36349.en:
My name is Serenea, and I'm a well-known warrior in this town. I inherited my father's swordsmanship. But my father, my only living
relative, has passed away, and now I'm all alone in this world. I'm managing on my own, but I'm having a bit of a problem. Will you at
least listen to me?

36350.en: <attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>What's the matter with you? You're impatient.

36351.en:
I'm talking about my father. He was a well- known warrior in his homeland of Gran Zedora. I wanted to be just like him! He left me the
book of secrets to become a true warrior. The bottle containing the book is too hard to open. According to my father, it will open
when the time is right, but I want to see it right now. If I have <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, it should open. If you bring it to me, I'll help
you on your journey. How about it?

Thank God! That's a big help. I think I can become a true warrior if I can read that book of secrets. I want to become stronger and get
closer to my father as soon as possible. I'll be waiting for you here.

Are you sure? But you have a lot of favors to
do. I'm not in a hurry, so please come back
after you've finished with those.

36355.en: I see. Well, I won't force you.

36356.en:
The jar containing the book of secrets to become a true warrior has a very hard lid. You have to be very strong to open it. It's a
bottle, so it's okay if you break it, but it was my father's memento.

36357.en:
Ah . Looks like you brought <%sev_que_name4> with you. Now you can open the jar that contains the book of secrets to
becoming a true warrior. Now, will you give it to me?

36358.en: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you! All right. Now, if I only had this.<e_turn_dir_s>

36360.en: <attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><turn_pc>I did it! It's open. Okay, I'll read it.

36361.en:
To my daughter Serenea.I'm amazed you managed to open this bottle. I'm glad to see you've grown up so strong. But, as for you... You
cheated somehow, didn't you? You've always been like that. But there is no shortcut to becoming a true warrior. Don't try to take it
easy, but work steadily. Then you will be a true warrior someday.

36362.en:
I see. He saw through everything, didn't he? I guess I can't compete with my dad. Thank you . Thanks to you, I finally know
what I need to do. Next time, I'll have to thank you. If it's okay with me, please take me on your trip. Thank you !

36363.en:
I see. You're using it for something else.
I'll come back later, so please bring it back.

36365.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Serenea painted <%sev_que_name4> on the edge
of the hard bottle.

36367.en:
Thanks to , I was able to open the jar containing my father's book of secrets with ease. But there is no shortcut to
becoming a true warrior. I remember what you said. Thank you . I will train hard and become a true warrior.

36368.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hey <kyodai>. I'm trying my best to be a
true warrior while traveling with you. I guess
there are no shortcuts in any vocation.

36369.en:
Hello, traveler. My name is Janet. Nice to meet you. You're an alchemist. Hey, I know this is a bit of a toot-toot, but do you have
a love affair with weapons?

36370.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Hmm. I thought you would understand my love of
weapons, but I was wrong.

36371.en:
Well, you give a good answer. Even the strongest warriors are not strong against humans, but against weapons. There is no limit
to the number of opponents a human can beat in a bare-knuckle fight. That's why I always remember to appreciate and love weapons. Okay,
I've decided! You will help me with my collection! You must smelt <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>! For me, of course. Bring it to me and I'll
help you on your journey!

36374.en:
You won't help me? I see. So you're busy cleaning your weapon? If that's the case, I have no choice. I'll be here, so come back
when you're free.

36375.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I am a weapon collector and you are an

these two together!<open_irai><bw_break>

<%sev_que_name4> is the best sword I've ever seen! Hmmm. Now my collection is once again growing. Thank you . Now it's my
turn to fulfill my promise. I would love to help you on your journey with your alchemy skills!

36380.en:
Thank you . You may be the only one who can make a sword like this to my liking. I will call this <%sev_que_name4> the
Sword out of gratitude and affection for you.

36381.en:
Hey, what's up? Don't you use the <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> you gave me in combat? You're trying to tell me that. No, not at all! I have
to have a variety of <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> for appreciation, for preservation, for teaching, for practice, for cuddling, and so on! If you
really use it and even chip the blade, it will be useless. For real combat, your regular sword will suffice.

36382.en:
Hey there, I'm Tonios, the warrior and cook who keeps the town's children and food safe. Swinging my sword at monsters outside and
swinging my knife at foodstuffs at home, I'm called Tonios the Cooking Warrior by all the good kids of Nalbia. But lately I have a
problem. The mothers of Nalbia's good children have asked me to cook something that will make their children smarter. As you can see, I'm a
physical man, so I have no idea how to make them smarter. But they are true swords. So here it is! I want you, the traveler, to think
of a seasoning that will make you wise and bring it to me! If you're a traveler, you'll know what I mean. If you bring me something
that fits the bill, I'll be happy to help you on your journey! How about it, will you take me up on it?

36391.en:
Sorry for the wait . It's mage- style fried rice with starchy sauce by Whimsical Warrior. Let's try it. Nuh-uh! This

What, you're going to use it for something
else? Well, then I guess I'll have to do it.

36393.en:
I am very grateful to for teaching me the good seasonings. From now on, I hope you can count on me like the good kids
in this town. If there is any dish you want to eat, please let me know anytime.

36394.en:
It is the duty of a culinary warrior to protect the children of the town and food safety. I'm glad to see that the town is at
peace today. Nalbia is like my spiritual home. I am grateful to for stopping by like this.

36395.en:
Ah! Are you ? I am a level 10 mage Kudin. Actually, I'm a drifter too. Heh heh. I lost my <%sev_que_name4> that my master
gave me when I first came to this town. Oh, yes, please! Could you make a new <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and bring it to me? I
will accompany on his journey if you bring it with you!

36396.en:
Really! Whew. Thank God. When I told my master that I lost it when I met him, he would have made Bangers out of me. Master is quite old,
so he won't notice the new <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> anyway, so it's okay. I'll be waiting for you ! I'll be waiting here.

<%sev_que_name4>, didn't you? I'm so glad~.
Then, may I take it right away?<yesno><break>

36401.en:
Yes, yes, yes! This is exactly what I was looking for <%sev_que_name4>! Thank you ! Huh? But it's prettier than I
thought. The one my master had given me was even more tattered, wasn't it? I wonder if Master would notice a brand-new
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> like this. Yes, I know! I'll rip him to pieces by accompanying on his journey, as I promised!

Even though he is a very old man, I'm sure Master would notice a brand-new <%sev_que_name4> like this. But if you have

honestly told him I lost it. Hee hee! I'm scared, scared. Oops, that's right . When you take me out on your
trip, please go to the tavern and ask to be introduced to me.

I'll join you when I get out of town! I'm going to use in a spell that I learned from my master! I'm also using the
<%sev_que_name4> I got from you. I've been using <%sev_que_name4> a lot. When I use it with my master's face in my mind, it's getting
torn to pieces naturally. Why is that?

36406.en:
Hey there! I'm Buldar, a level 17 martial artist. I'm a nice guy who's good at swimming! I'm a nice guy who's good at swimming! I'm not
from this town, but nice to meet you! Buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh buh! Oh, it's so sad. As you
can see, I have nothing to wear. I was swimming near my village. I was swimming near my village, and somehow I ended up on the
shore of this town. I was in the mood for a quick swim, so I left all my clothes at home. You know..! You! Can you please bring me my
regular clothes and a pair of shoes? My favorite clothes and shoes are <%sev_que_name4>, <%sev_que_name5> and
<%sev_que_name6>! If you bring them all, I'll even go with you on your trip! Or rather, I'll catch a cold, please!

36407.en:
Really? Thanks a lot! I don't know where I'm going or how to get home, so I'm stuck here even if I wanted to go home! Listen, my
favorite clothes and shoes are <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, <%sEV_QUE_NAME5> and <%sEV_QUE_NAME6>! I'm gonna catch a cold and
be mistaken for a prowler if I keep these clothes on! Please! Please, hurry up and bring it!

36408.en:
Really? Thanks a lot! But don't you have a lot of people asking you for favors? You'd better get that taken care of before you come back to
me again! I'm begging you!

36410.en:
I left my clothes at home when I swam here. Thank God you're here. Listen, my regular clothes and shoes are <%sev_que_name4>,
<%sev_que_name5>, and <%sev_que_name6>!

<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oooh <kyodai>! You brought me my favorite

<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Oh! Thank you, thank you, thank you! I'll put
it on right away!<e_turn_dir_w>

36423.en:
Ahhh! It's so warm! That's me in my usual clothes! Nice guy Buldar, back again! Ha-ha- ha! I'm in a good mood unless I'm wearing my
usual clothes! Thanks ! I owe you a debt of gratitude! Okay! I'll follow you on your journey! I'll be following you on your
journey!

eekshoo!

<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><kyodai> gave Buldar his favorite
clothes and shoes!

36426.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Buldar equipped himself with his favorite
clothes and shoes!

36427.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Thanks for bringing my favorite clothes and
shoes <kyodai>! I would have been a
lost, suspicious, disgusting man! Ha-ha-ha-ha!

36428.en:
Oooh! ! I'm not sure if this is a good idea or not, but I'm sure you'll be able to help me out! I've been swimming for a
bit and ended up in this town because of my poor sense of direction! I'm not sure how to do this!

36429.en:
M! Are you the alchemist San desu? I am martial artist Shien, level 14. I'm a level 14 martial artist Shien,
please! I am looking for <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> <%nev_que_t_num4> and <%sEV_QUE_NAME5> <%nev_que_t_num5>! I'm
homesick from my village in the countryside. If you give me those things that you used to use back home, I'll give them to you in return
and accompany you on your journey! Please give me those things you used to have back home!

36431.en:
O! Thank you! City people are surprisingly kind, aren't they? Sorry for asking so much. I always use <%sev_que_name4> <%nev_que_t_num4>
and <%sev_que_name5> <%nev_que_t_num5> in my home village. Without them, I'm not very well. So, , please do me a favor!

36432.en:
O! Thank you! But it seems that san has lots of work. As expected of an alchemist! San,
I'll ask you again when I have time.

36433.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Aiyah! I see. I'm sorry, but there's nothing I
can do. But if you feel like it, please do.

36434.en:
I can't believe I left my village in the countryside and came to a city with so many people and buildings. Oh! I miss my hometown.
I think I'd feel better if I had something I used to use in my home village. Please bring me <%sev_que_name4> with <%nev_que_t_num4> and
<%sev_que_name5> with <%nev_que_t_num5>! Please!

36435.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ayer! <kyodai>San! You brought me what I
asked for! Please give it to me!<yesno><break>

36436.en:
Oh, thank you! San, are you wondering what I'm going to use all this stuff for? I'll tell you what I'm going to do. Then
I'll tell you. Please wait for me~!

36437.en:
Ta-da! This is the secret medicinal hot water that has been handed down in my village! In my village, everyone from adults to children
drink this medicinal hot spring morning, noon and night. That's why everyone is so strong and healthy! I am the weakest person in my
village. That's why I left the village to train myself to become stronger! When I first came here, I was almost defeated by the rough
seas of the city, but I remembered the taste of my hometown and I became strong again! San! Thank you for your
kindness. I will keep my promise and accompany you!

36438.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Ayer! <kyodai>San! You have it, but you
won't give it to me? City people are cold,
aren't they~!

36440.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Shien placed <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> into a squashed
and heated <%sEV_QUE_NAME5>.

36441.en:
My home village is deep in the mountains. I was once thrown out of the village wearing only my street clothes and stayed in the wild
for a month by myself! I was 4 years old when I did that training. It was hard work because I was so young! It made me a little stronger.
But I'm still too weak to get homesick! I think I need to train a lot more! San! When you go on your
training trip, please ask someone from the tavern to introduce me and take me with you!

36442.en:
San! Even if you want to drink the secret medicinal water, don't drink it! I heard that if anyone other than people from my
village drink it, they will have a side effect of having a stomachache for three days and three nights!

36443.en:
Oh, I'm so hungry, my eyes are blurry. Is that you there, Mr. Reaper? I guess my short life is over. As a level 6 thief, I've done some
pretty outrageous things, and I knew I wasn't going to make it to heaven. But even reapers have a sense of compassion, right? Before I
die, I want to eat my favorite food, <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, one more time. Please, reaper. I'll follow you to hell and back.

36444.en:
Thanks reaper. <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> has a tangy, yet strangely lingering taste. As long as I can eat <%SEV_QUE_NAME4>, I have no more
regrets about this world.

36445.en:
Thanks, reaper. But you seem to be busy with a lot of pick-up jobs. Is the economy doing well in these times? I'm envious of you, but please
come back again before I die.

36446.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Reapers are cold, after all. I can't believe
they won't even listen to my last request.

36447.en:
You reapers may not know this, but <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> is the best delicacy for me. As long as I can eat <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, I have
no more regrets about this world. I'll follow you to hell and back.

36448.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Ah, Mr. reaper. You brought <%sev_que_name4>.
Thank you, reaper. Would you pass that on to
me for my last meal?<yesno><break>

36449.en:
So this is my The Last Gourmet. Well then, I'll have some. Mmm. The unique aroma and stimulating taste. It's as if kittens are
dancing on my tongue. And what's more, I'm feeling energized! I didn't know that <%sev_que_name4> could cure hunger! I didn't
know that <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> could help with hunger! You're a human, aren't you? I'm sorry I mistook the man who saved my life for a
reaper. I wish I could do something to repay you. I remember when you said you'd follow me anywhere, even to hell. Okay! A woman
thiefMurine never says ''no''. If you're so inclined, you can introduce me at the tavern. I'll follow you on your journey as promised.

<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>What, you want to enjoy watching me slowly
weaken? That reaper is really a bad guy, isn't

36452.en:
Now that I think about it, I must have been very abusive to mistake you for a reaper. Oh yeah, from now on, I'll always be there to
help you on your journey, so if you're ever in trouble, just ask for a referral at the tavern.

36453.en:
Some people don't like <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> because of its peculiar taste, but sometimes I have a strange craving for it. When
goes out, I'll join him, so please use <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> when you recover.

36454.en:
Hmm? You don't look familiar. I'm thief Kervis, the best treasure hunter in this town. Heh. You're an alchemist? I envy you as a man
with a wife and kids, traveling freely. Actually, I just got back from a trip a little while ago. But I'm having a bit of trouble,
and it's hard to go home. I'm a lazy kid, so I tend to be away from home a lot. I went on a treasure-hunting trip to give my wife a
present to cheer her up. But what I found was a Strength Ring. If I gave her a gift like this, my wife would become even more
frightened. That's right. You're an alchemist, right? I'll give you this Strength Ring, but you have to change it into a more peaceful
wand. Of course, I'm not asking for free. If you can make a good ring, I'll help you on your journey. What do you think?

this! Can I have it?

36480.en:
Thanks ! Actually, my wife told me that our daughter was being bullied by her friends. She's a bimbo because she doesn't
have the latest in fashion accessories! Woebergine's girl! I'm so sorry. But now I won't be bullied anymore. I'll go give it to
her right away. I'll definitely get Joy!

36481.en:
Sorry. <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> is not popular anymore, so I was told I don't need it. Instead, what's popular now is the
Woebergine impersonation. In other words, yes! She's imitating me! My daughter said, ''Dad, that's great! Everyone is imitating you!
Everyone is imitating you! I don't know what's more frustrating, happy, or whatever, O-chan! But it was enough for me to see my daughter's
smile! Thank you . I'll accompany you on your trip as promised!

<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>They won't give it to me! Shocked! But Pops is
persistently waiting for <kyodai> to
change his mind~!

36484.en:
For the sake of his beloved wife and daughter, he becomes a clown on stage and is laughed at. Minstrels take pride in their locations. But I
didn't expect that my poor impersonation would become so popular. And when you take Pops on your trip, please go to the tavern and ask him
to introduce you. Best regards .

36485.en:
! After Woebergine, I'm thinking of doing an Ornery Onion impersonation! I'm sure Ornery Onion will be the next popular
one! I'll have to watch Ornery Onion when I travel and study his tricks more and more. I'll follow when he goes out.
Let's go!

36486.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oh? Are you, by any chance, the town's
alchemist?<yesno><break>

36487.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Yes. I heard that there is an alchemist living
in this town who is very talented, so I came
here.

36488.en:
You are just as I thought. I came to this town because I heard that you are a talented alchemist. It is an honor to meet you. My name
is Alisis of Minstrel. People call me the Dancing Princess of the Beastly Beasts. I am a dancer, and my specialty is dodging and
defeating ferocious monsters with my beautiful dance. My skill has been well received, and I am honored to be able to show you my dance at
the royal palace of Gran Zedora. However, there is a particularly difficult one, the Dance of the Seven Colors, which requires
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. That is why I came to see you.Alchemist, please bring <%sev_que_name4> for me. If you do, I will accompany you on
your journey. Please, will you accept it?

36489.en:
I see you can take care of it. Thank you very much. You are indeed a man of renown in this town. It's not every day you get a chance to
show the king your dances. I want to show him my best moves in the best form. I'm sure he'll be watching. I'll be waiting for your splendid
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, alchemist.

36490.en:
I see. But for now, that feeling is all I need. Alchemist, you must be busy, right? It seems that you are taking on various requests
from other people. Why don't you go take care of that first?

36491.en:
I see. It's a pity, because I thought you would be able to do it. But since I came all the way here looking for you, I won't give up.
I'm sure your feelings may change.

36492.en:
I am honored to be invited by the King of Gran Zedora, who has heard rumors of the high reputation of my dances. But the most
difficult feat to perform there, the Dance of the Seven Colors, requires <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>.

36493.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Mr. Alchemist. I see you brought
<%sev_que_name4> with you. May I have it,
please?<yesno><break>

36494.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Ah <%sev_que_name4>! I haven't seen this since
that man passed away.

36495.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Yes. You have it, but you won't give it to me.
It's a shame, because I believed in you.

36497.en:
Why do you continue to engage in the dangerous seven-color dances after losing your beloved husband? People ask me. But only I can perform
the Seven Colors Dance. This art, which I created with my husband and which I alone have protected, is now my very life.

36498.en:
It seems that the more ferocious the enemy is, the more beautiful my dances become. My late husband said so. Perhaps that feeling of
risking one's life to take a look at something that cannot be obtained ordinarily gives birth to a kind of glow.

36499.en:
I am Ortho, a level 6 priest.One day I had an awakening. I was awakened one day by the fascination of Medicinal Herb flavors. And
right now, I want to enjoy the fragrance of the Emperor of Medicinal Herb, who is better than Strong Medicine, <%sev_que_name4>!
Please! Would you bring <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> with you? I'll help you with anything on your journey!

Oh God, Spirit ! I thank you for this day that I have met you! Well then, please come right out and bring your
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. I will be waiting for you here!

36501.en:
Ah, I appreciate your kind words, but you give off a faint aroma as if I have received too many requests from you! I recommend that you
put your requests away and go for a milder fragrance.

36502.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> What a celebrity
fragrance...a dream come true for me.

36503.en:
I wonder what kind of tolebian flavors <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> will be playing in my nose. Just thinking about it makes me swoon. Ahh, I
want to rub my face in <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> as soon as possible!

36504.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>kun. What's that scent? You have
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, don't you? Please give it to
me right away!<yesno><break>

36506.en:
Mmmm...exellent! My nose is trembling at the scent, which is as innocent and stoic as first love! My nose is trembling? Is there something
in my nose? Hee..! A caterpillar? Caterpillars?

36507.en:
No more Medicinal Herb! I'll never carry it around again! It's the age of the spell, isn't it? As promised, I will help you on your
journey.If you need my recovery spell, please add me as a companion in your tavern!

36508.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no! Right now you are giving off such a
seductive scent that I can hardly breathe!

36510.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ortho inhaled the scent of <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>
all the way through!

36511.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I still have the feeling of caterpillars in my
nose. If it is OK with me, please feel free to
add me as a companion in your tavern!

36512.en:
I have found recovery spells to be very useful. I've been awakened to the charm of recovery spells. I'll be sure to join you when
goes out, so please leave the recovery to me!

36514.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Yes. You're a romantic. I wonder if you
believe my outrageous fairy tale.

36515.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>So, you're Rialist. But please, will you
listen to my outrageous fairy tale?

36516.en:
I am Momona, the princess. Since I was born, I have had a mysterious power to see people's destinies in my dreams. And now a human is
about to die by an unforgivable fate. But that person's fate can be changed. If there is a large amount of <%SEV_QUE_NAME4>. Yes. If you
work hard, you might be able to save that person. Because you are an alchemist, right? Hmmm... I know everything.Hey, please. Could
you smelt about <%sev_que_name4> <%nev_que_t_num4> bottles of it and bring them to me? If you save that person, I'll be sure
to lend you my power. I hope you can help me.

36517.en:
Woohoo. Thank you . You are just as sweet as I dreamed you would be. You have the power to change people's destiny. Please
save that man.

36518.en:
You are just as sweet as I dreamed you would be. But you know what I know. Your kindness sometimes leads to your downfall. You
shouldn't be so burdened with other people's wishes. I hope you will come to see me again when you have finished your work.
36518.ja:

36519.en:
Oh, my God, what am I going to do? This is the
first time my premonition has come true.

36520.en:
You have the power to change people's destinies. You can save the dying. All you need is a <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> <%nev_que_t_num4>
book. Don't ever forget it.

36521.en:
. You collected <%sev_que_name4> for me <%nev_que_t_num4>. In my dreams, I saw you smelting them as hard as you could.
Oooooh. Now will you give it to me?

36522.en:
Well done. It's filled with pure power. This is a perfect tool for destroying evil. Thank you . Actually, this isn't the
first time I've saved a certain someone who told me he was doomed to die. He's a fool, that boy. He keeps repeating the same fate.
Each time I have changed his fate. I use up so much of <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> every time I try to save her. More than I could ever procure.
That's why I've been waiting for you. A good alchemist, . This will prevent her death for a while. Actually, the best
thing to do would be to talk to her, but she won't listen to me. I'm so glad I met you. I'm so glad I found you. Now, I hope you'll use my
powers to your advantage.

36523.en:
Oh, that's funny. In my dreams, you were more
straightforward.

36525.en:
Precognitive dreams are cruel things. I dreamed over and over again that she died, to the point of disgust. I'd cry, jump up and
down, fall asleep again, and repeat the dream. I cursed my fate. But it's okay. Thanks to this power, I can change her fate. My dream is
protecting her dream.

36526.en:
Hmmm. It seems that you've done that idiot a favor. You see now, don't you? It is my twin sister Mimina who is dancing with the fates.
With her current strength, she'll be killed by a horrible demon god whom she summoned in a ritual. But don't worry, Mimina will truly
become the greatest witch in the world someday. Until then, I will protect her. That's my dream.

36527.en:
My name is Aigis and I am a level 18 priest! I came to this town for one reason only: to become Trendy Beach Fashion! I came to this
town for one reason and one reason only: to become Trendy Beach Fashion and get shitfaced with the freezing waves! Hey
. I'm asking you to do me a favor. Make <%sev_que_name4> and give it to me. If you do, I'll lend you my power?

36529.en:
Hyohoho! Thank goodness! Now, I'll just sit here and undress until you get back! I mean, Jordan please <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> me before
I start undressing!

<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hyohoho! Thank you very much! But aren't you
taking on too many requests? I can hold out a
little longer. Go take care of something else.
36530.ja:
ã€Œãƒ’ãƒ§ãƒ›ãƒ›ï¼ã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã®ã†ï¼ ã€€ã˜ã‚ƒãŒã®â€¦â€¦ã€€ãŠå‰ã•ã‚“ ã€€ä¾é ¼ã‚’ã€€å—ã‘ã™ãã¦ãŠã‚‰ã‚“ã‹ï¼Ÿ

36531.en: <attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Shall we? I'm sorry. I'm very sorry.

36532.en:
I'll wait here undressing until you get back! That's right, Jordan, before I get too excited and start taking off my clothes,
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> please!

36533.en:
<turn_pc><kyodai>! Oh, no way, that's...
that's... that's what you're holding in your
hand.<bw_break>

36534.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ho-ho-ho! This slender line! This is exactly
what I dreamed of! I'm going to go play with
the waves right now!

36535.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Ugh. I can't wait any longer. I'm taking it
off.

36537.en:
I wonder why. Suddenly I felt hollow. I wanted to be Trendy Beach Fashion so badly. I can go back to my training and reevaluate myself. I
want you to make me a companion and take me on a journey just as eagerly as you do at the tavern.

36538.en:
You . I've realized something. I realized that maybe the reason I couldn't become Trendy Beach Fashion was because I
didn't have enough Dangerous Midriff Wrap?

36539.en:
Well, to summon the nightmare demon, all I need is snake soup, dried Frog, and <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>! I'm Mimina, and I'm the
world's top mage level 14. My dream is to conquer the world! That's the basics. To achieve this, I want to summon a powerful
Famililar! But I don't have enough <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. So! I want you to make it by alchemy and bring it to me! If you do it, I'll
make you a world-conquering companion!

36541.en:
Okay, that's a good answer! Now, let me help you conquer the world. You're going to have to show me what you're made of! I'll go ahead and
prepare the ritual, so <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> hurry up and bring it to me!

36542.en:
Okay, your answer is good! But you yourself are not good at all! You take too many requests from other people! There's no way I'm
going to help you take over the world while you're looking the other way! Now go clean up your mess.

36543.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Hey, what? I didn't rely on a lousy alchemist
from the very beginning! Bakaa!

36544.en:
Dagger is an essential part of mage rituals, and it has a strong magic power. I hear that <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> has the strongest magical
power among them. It's perfect for summoning the demigod of nightmares, isn't it? I'm getting excited! Hurry up and bring me
<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> !

36545.en:
<turn_pc>The magic circle is perfectly painted and the
special offerings look delicious! I'm sure the
nightmare demons will come out dancing.<bw_break>

36546.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You're gonna do it <kyodai>! Now we're
ready for the Summoning Ceremony. Let's begin!

36547.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>O soul of DEMON that lurks deep in the bowels
of the earth. Here and now, eh?

36548.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Caw! What, that's dangerous! What if you get
hurt?

36549.en:
Oh, no! The magic circle, the offerings, everything. It's all so mushy! I got in the way again. Oh, no. I can't do it. I've failed
at this ritual so many times! Every time I do the summoning ritual, there's a little bug that spears the magic circle and makes it look
like a mess. I don't know what your intentions are, but if I find you, I'm going to make you a big, big mess! I have no choice but to make
you my companion for today. Someday, I'm going to make you Famililar!

<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>What the <kyodai> buckaroo! I was stupid
to ask you to do it!

36552.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Mimina began to invoke the summoner's spell in
a calm manner.

36553.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>At that moment, countless spears rained down
from the sky toward the magic circle!<se Joutyu_SE 49>

36554.en:
Ahhhh. I can't wait to summon the demon god of nightmares! Then I can conquer the world and prove that I'm the best in the world. And then
I'll tell Momona, my obnoxious twin sister who's always making fun of me, that she can have her way with me! I can give her half of
the world! Well, that's that, but if you ever need me, just call me from the tavern!

Hey ! You're on friendly terms with my twin sister Momona! You're a traitor! Don't be fooled! Momona is a super vicious
woman who ate my pumpkin Purine without my permission! She makes fun of me just because she was born a little bit earlier than me!
I'll definitely make Momona look up to me! Well, that's that, but if you need me, you'll have to call me from the tavern, won't you?

My name is Griot and I am a level 10 priest. I'm a level 10 priest, and I've been on a journey to fulfill a difficult mission, and
I've drifted into this town. I must get my hands on <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. Huh? Tell me why. It's complicated for you to understand.If you
make <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, I'll help you on your journey.

36557.en:
I knew you'd get it. Well then, I'm counting
on you. Okay, look. I want you to make
<%sev_que_name4>. Don't make a mistake.

<%sev_que_name4> soon! I'm counting on you.
Bring me the cutest <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> ever.<open_irai>

36561.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Oh, you don't mean <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>? Come on,
give me <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> quickly!<yesno><break>

36562.en:
Oh, no~ Ian~ What's this wand~? You're so~ cute~ I can't get enough of you~ Oh, no. I'm sorry. I'm just being myself. I'm
sorry. I've been hiding it, but I'm actually a man with a secret maiden's heart To compensate, I'll tell you the reason for my
journey! I dreamed of becoming a magical girl! In my mind, <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> is the must-have item for magical girls. In my search for it, I
met you by fate. Thank you . Let me accompany you to the ends of hell

36565.en:
When I first arrived on the island, I gave the townspeople a piece of my mind. I said, ''Haay I'm Griot. I even gave them a hug to
show my closeness! Then she screamed and ran away. That's why I suppressed my true self and treated you as if I were you. But from now on,
I want you to see me as I really am. If you ever want to see me again, just call me from the tavern.

36566.en:
It's strange. When I hold <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, somehow I can be an honest me! I can become a magical girl at heart! And if I wear a frilly
tutu or something, I'll look like a cute little magical girl from every angle! Oh no, my dreams are expanding! When
goes outside, I'll be sure to join her! And I'm going to make you feel better.

36567.en:
My name is Morpheus, a level 18 mage who is not bound by time. Since my birth, I've encountered many shoes over the centuries.
Some of my old friends have requested a certain shoe made by human hands. One named <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>. I would like you to make
them for me. I'd be very grateful. Yes, of course. How about I help you on your journey?

36568.en:
Thanks. You're a big help . I think you are the only alchemist who can do this job. Not only are you good at alchemy,
but you have the most bizarre destiny than anyone else, and I'm looking forward to seeing the kutsu you make.

36569.en:
You can only wear one pair of shoes. A human has only two feet. In the same way, the number of jobs one person can take on is naturally
fixed. Let's meet again after I finish other requests.

36570.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I see. Eventually your shoes will lead you
back to me. I have an endless supply of time.
I'll wait patiently.

36571.en:
Each pair of shoes has a story to tell. The human being who holds them in his/her hands will follow the story. The shoe you will be
refining this time is a pair of shoes named <%SEV_QUE_NAME4>. I wonder what story will reside in this shoe.

36572.en:
Hey . Looks like <%sev_que_name4> is ready. You're the alchemist of destiny, as they say. I'm
counting on you. Now, will you hand over those shoes to me?

36573.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Brilliant workmanship. Thank you
<kyodai>.I'm sure my old friends will be
pleased. Come on out, little shoemakers.

36574.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>This is the thoughtful set you wanted, made by
human hands. Take it with you.

36575.en:
They are the fairy Kutsukasa.They are very studious. Occasionally they come to me for a pair of exquisite human-made shoes. The human-
made shoes have stories of love, dreams, desire, despair, and all sorts of other things that a fairy couldn't make. They are not made
by fairies. The fairies seem to be impressed with your story.Now, for the sake of the alchemist with the strange destiny, I will
lend you all the power I have.

36576.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I see. That's such a fine set. I can't blame
you for being reluctant to part with it.

36578.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Suddenly, the area darkened and small lights
began to flicker.

36579.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><%sEV_QUE_NAME4> was sucked into the light and
slowly faded away.

36580.en:
Fairy footwear makers have created many magical footwear that have left their mark on history. They are said to have created shoes
that make you happy just by walking on them, as well as magical shoes blessed by the Fairy King. Now, whenever you need my help, just
call me from the tavern.

36581.en:
This place is nice .All the houses have a warm sound. It must be complicated for you who have drifted to this
place by choice. But don't get depressed. You are alive here. Your shoes will continue to guide you through this strange fate.

36997.en:
Well done! Alchemy master! There is no alchemist like you anywhere in the world. There's nothing more I can teach you. You've
worked so hard until now. I am proud of you! The Gold Shrine is located in a place called Valley Square, far south of Sazamire Prairie.
Use the key to find the treasure inside the fortress!

36998.en:
Mm-hmm. I see. Gold Shrine has a monster of incomparable strength. Don't worry. You have alchemy. You can get the strong guys in town
to become your companion. Good luck, alchemy master!

36999.en:
What? You beat up a strong monster at the Gold Shrine? I can't believe he's really going to do it! No, that's not the point now! No,
that's not the point right now! Alchemy master! I don't need that kind of report, so get on over there and check out the treasures
in the Gold Shrine!

37899.en:
Then, why don't you go to my Alchemy Pot and smelt Strong Medicine? If you can't do alchemy, get out of here! If you've learned
the recipe, you can find it in the ''Pot Recipe Book'' in Records! You can find the ingredients you need there!

37900.en:
Then get on with learning the recipe! I'll tell you about my daughter afterwards! You can learn simple recipes by selecting
''Introduction to Alchemy for Beginners'' from the ''item'' menu. The book disappears after you learn the recipe, but you can check the
contents in the ''Kettle Alchemy Recipe Book'' in Records. It will tell you what ingredients you will need! Now, learn the recipe and try
smelting Strong Medicine in my Alchemy Pot! If you can do it, do it!

37901.en:
. Looks like you made it deep into the Blue Shrine! Well then, here's a present from me! I'm sure it will be useful
for !

37902.en:
The Zoomstone is a magical stone that will bring you back to this town as soon as you use it. And even if you use it many times, it
never runs out. It was given to me by my mother, and I'm giving it to for her! Don't hesitate to use it!

37903.en:
The Zoomstone is a magical stone that will bring you back to this town as soon as you use it. And it never runs out, no matter how many
times you use it. Also, it is said that there are three dust mounds in Polnea Mountain west of Sazamire Prairie, one white, one gray, and
one black, and each of them is said to be inhabited by a terrifying monster. So, if becomes strong enough to defeat
the White Shrine monster, please do me a favor.

37904.en:
That's amazing ! I can't believe they beat the White Shrine monster! Yeah. I can only hope that you can do it now! Take
this key.

37905.en:
There is a material that can be used to make the key to the Ash Shrine in the Green Shrine Cave. I was exposed to a cursed fog near the
Ash Shrine and got Kafrizz Fever. I think it must have been caused by the monster that lives in that dusty place. Also, take this
with you! I'm sure will find it useful!

37906.en:
The Zoomstone is a magical stone that will bring you back to this town as soon as you use it. And even if you use it many times, it
never runs out. It was given to me by my mother, and I'm giving it to for her! Don't hesitate to use it!

37907.en:
Oh? It looks like your bag is full. Call out
to me when you empty your bag!

37909.en:
<kyodai> received the key to Green
Shrine (Key Item)!<me 60>

37937.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oops! From the look on your face, I'd say
you've smelted that ring I asked you for.
Okay, give it to me!<yesno><break>

37938.en:
I am sorry. I didn't tell you the details of my situation. I once had a husband who was also a minstrel.Together, we created and
performed the art of Maijutsu, and we quickly became known throughout the world. Finally, the king of Gran Zedora heard of our
reputation and invited us. Just as he does now. I challenged him to the Dance of the Seven Colors, but due to my inexperience, the
hexenbiest took <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> from me, and I was so upset that I was unable to move. At that time, my husband took it upon himself to
stop the hexenbiest from running amok and protect me. But because of that, my husband never returned. I was so sad that I almost
gave up my career as an artist. But I couldn't let him and the skills he had created sleep. I have taken up the art of performing once
again, and now I have the chance to do it again. I will make you succeed next time! There are still a few days left before the
palace dances. Until then, I will continue to improve my dancing while accompanying you on your journey.

<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>Well, as long as I have <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, I

you here.

44802.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><close_irai>Now go make <%sev_que_name4> for this Atashi's
collection. I'll be waiting for you here!

44803.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><close_irai>Bububububu, Buekushoii! BuRubul. breadts are
indeed a little bit sad. I'm asking you
<kyodai>!

44804.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>My son Charles is smart enough to know what
he's talking about, but he's a Sizzler.

44805.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><close_irai>It's so popular among girls, so it must be
cute.

44812.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>That's why I came all the way here looking for
you. I'll be waiting for the finished product.

44814.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>Come on, show us your skills. You are an
alchemist with a strange fate.

45358.en:
Hear, hear! ! There's someone in town who wants to meet you! He said he heard a rumor somewhere! , he can do
something special, like alchemy, can't he? I wonder if he came to ask for a favor. If you have a favor to ask, the color of the name
above your head is purple. If you see him, talk to him!

<%sEV_QUE_NAME4> <kyodai>! Come on, give
it to me!<yesno><break>

46117.en:
<%sev_que_name4>!The time has finally come for
me to become Trendy Beach Fashion! Now, will
you give it to me?<yesno><break>

46118.en:
Oh no..! Iyan, it's so cold<heart> Hey, look,
look, look<heart> The sunburn spots are already
so much...I'm so tired!

46119.en:
Hmmm. Thank you .If you ask me if I am satisfied, I would say that life is a journey of endless exploration. There may have
been a slight gap from the image that I had long envisioned. I will live an honest life as a priest, after all. Please push me around as
much as you want, as you promised.

46120.en:
Aigis dressed in <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and ran to
the edge of the surf!

46121.en:
Ahhhh. I can't wait to summon the demon god of nightmares! Then I can conquer the world and prove that I'm the best in the world. And then
I'll tell Momona, my obnoxious twin sister who's always making fun of me, that she can have her way with me! I can give her half of
the world!

46122.en:
Hey ! You're on friendly terms with my twin sister Momona! You're a traitor! Don't be fooled! Momona is a super vicious
woman who ate my pumpkin Purine without my permission! She makes fun of me just because she was born a little bit earlier than me!
I'll definitely make Momona pay for this!
